Request Parameters
SkyView Comparisons
This page allows users to display images from the NEAT archive, look at sources within the field of view, and compare the NEAT data with SkyView DSS images.

Select one or more images returned and choose from the available options. If you did not specify a position originally (i.e., this was a time search), enter a name or coordinate in the coordinate box.

You may choose to look at individual NEAT images (singlets), or trios of NEAT images taken for the same region with about a 20 minute separation (triplets). You may also view the same region using the SkyView service to get a DSS image, or to overlay the NEAT and DSS data using SkyView.

For the singlet and triplet images, information the objects NEAT has found in that region can be retrieved. (Currently problems in the NEAT object catalog may prevent this feature from working).
